mapper.select:
select
,ub.name AS userName, ub2.name AS auditorName, ubc.bank_card_no AS bankCardNo, ubc.opening_bank AS openingBank, ubc.phone AS phone, ubc.opening_bank_province AS openingBankProvince, ubc.opening_bank_city AS openingBankCity, ubc.bank_card_no_sign AS bankCardNoSign from withdraw_detail t left join user_basic ub on ub.id = t.uid left join user_basic ub2 on ub2.id = t.audit_uid left join user_bank_card ubc on ubc.id = t.card_id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
